title: Average sales per unit of Outback Steakhouse restaurants in the U.S. 2015 to 2018
yAxis: Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars
summary: This line chart has an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Average sales in thousand U.S. dollars, with a total of 4 data points. The chart has 2 significant trends.
The longest trend is extremely negative which exists from 2018 to 2015.
But, the next significant trend is slightly positive which exists from 2018 to 2018.
